Question: Toyshock International Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Toyshock International Ltd.

CES 2024

- Unveiling new line of interactive gaming products
- Integration of advanced motion-sensing technology
- Enhanced virtual reality experience
- Expanded library of games and content
- Compatible with multiple gaming platforms
- Improved user interface and navigation
- Enhanced multiplayer capabilities
- Sleek and ergonomic design
- Customizable options for personalized gaming experience
Summary_cn:
Toyshock国际有限公司。

CES 2024

- 揭晓全新互动游戏产品系列
- 结合先进的动作感应技术
- 增强的虚拟现实体验
- 扩展的游戏和内容库
- 兼容多个游戏平台
- 改进的用户界面和导航
- 增强的多人游戏功能
- 时尚且符合人体工学设计
- 可自定义选项，以获得个性化的游戏体验
